price: ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߦߟߌߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
